alert.note: Alert for Breathitt (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 17 at 11:27AM EST until February 17 at 8:57PM EST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Jackson KY has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Kentucky... North Fork Kentucky River at Jackson affecting Breathitt County. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...North Fork Kentucky River at Jackson. * WHEN...Until this evening. * IMPACTS...At 29.0 feet, Low lying areas flood. Water begins inundating Wolverine Road just north of the Hays Depot bridge. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:00 AM EST Friday the stage was 28.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this morning to a crest of 30.0 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage this afternoon. - Flood stage is 29.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 30.0 feet on 04/29/1970. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. The next statement will be issued 5 PM EST Friday.
